org.apache.hive.hcatalog.mapreduce

Class HCatInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,HCatRecord>
      • org.apache.hive.hcatalog.mapreduce.HCatBaseInputFormat
        • org.apache.hive.hcatalog.mapreduce.HCatInputFormat

  • @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Stable
public class HCatInputFormat
extends HCatBaseInputFormat
    The InputFormat to use to read data from HCatalog.

      Deprecated. 
      as of 0.13, slated for removal with 0.15 Use setInput(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration, String, String, String) instead, to specify a partition filter to directly initialize the input with.

      • setInput

        public static HCatInputFormat setInput(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                       String dbName,
                                       String tableName,
                                       String filter)
                                throws IOException
        Set inputs to use for the job. This queries the metastore with the given input specification and serializes matching partitions into the job conf for use by MR tasks.
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
        dbName - database name, which if null 'default' is used
        tableName - table name
        filter - the partition filter to use, can be null for no filter
        Throws:
        IOException - on all errors

      • setFilter

        @Deprecated
public HCatInputFormat setFilter(String filter)
                                      throws IOException
        Deprecated. as of 0.13, slated for removal with 0.15 Use setInput(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration, String, String, String) instead, to specify a partition filter to directly initialize the input with.
        Throws:
        IOException

        public HCatInputFormat setProperties(Properties properties)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • getPartitionColumns

        public static HCatSchema getPartitionColumns(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
                                      throws IOException
        Return partitioning columns for this input, can only be called after setInput is called.
        Returns:
        partitioning columns of the table specified by the job.
        Throws:
        IOException
